law.catch_line: Rights of taxpayer whose name is erroneously published.
law.text: If the department publishes a name under KRS 131.650 in error, the taxpayer whose name was erroneously published has all the rights enumerated in KRS 131.081 for an aggrieved taxpayer.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 167, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 366, sec. 12, effective January 1, 2003.
